content: **size** 1-4 years 4-10 years 10+ years **measurements** width 20 25 30 cm / 8 10 12 inch length 34 38 5 43 cm / 13 15 17 inch **materials** 2 2 2 skeins of fluffy day xl col 13 **hook** crochet hook 7 mm k/l **yarn quality** fluffy day xl hobbii 100% acrylic 100 g 3 5 oz = 140 m 153 yds **gauge** 10 sts x 9 row = 10 cm x 10 cm / 4 x 4 **pattern information** this beginner friendly pattern is worked in rounds of half_double_crochet followed by row of half_double_crochet the top is slip stitched together and the ears are sewn on afterwards the pattern contains written instructions per round/row and total stitch counts for each round/row **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6 spanish 7 italian 8 polish
